alert.note: Alert for East Bay Hills; San Francisco Bay Shoreline (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 08 at 8:07PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Alameda County through 830 PM PST... At 805 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cherryland, or over San Lorenzo, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...This cell has a history of producing pea size hail over San Francisco and could potentially produce more over the East Bay. There is a slight chance for locally erratic and brief heavier rains along with it. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hayward, San Leandro, Union City, Dublin, San Lorenzo, Castro Valley, Fairview, Cherryland and Ashland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Bay Hills; San Francisco Bay Shoreline
